item.title: A Guide to Flashing Custom ROMs [Android]
item.description: (This blog starts off with a warning: Although the process is super easy and there hardly is a chance that you will brick your device during the process but, it’s my responsibility to make you aware of it) The guide would be inclined more towards Xiaomi devices as I own one and have worked with it. But, all other devices follow the same process, so go ahead and give it a read.
